author: Brodie Robertson | Linux Tips & Tricks
description:
Recently Arch Linux pushed the 590 NVIDIA drivers and with these they dropped support for Maxwell and Pascal GPUs, the 900 and 10 series GPUs and Arch Linux didn't implement a migration strategy for this so good luck with that.

title: RIP Nvidia GPUs On Arch Linux
